sdmr.shop.tab.title: Title
sdmr.shop.tab.title.tooltip: The title that will be displayed at the tab
sdmr.shop.tab.icon.tooltip: An icon in the form of an object that will be displayed near the title. Right-click to open the extended window
sdmr.shop.tab.dependencies.questID.toolt: The ID of the quests that must be completed by the player in order for the tab to be displayed
sdmr.shop.tab.dependencies.gameStages.to: The stages that must be completed by the player in order for the tab to be displayed
sdmr.shop.tab.dependencies.factionID.too: Fractions that can see the tab
sdmr.shop.entry.tittle.tooltip: The title that will be displayed when hovering over
sdmr.shop.entry.count.tooltip: The number of items to be bought or sold at a time
sdmr.shop.entry.price.tooltip: The amount for which the product will be bought or sold at a time
sdmr.shop.entry.dependencies.questID.too: The ID of the quests that must be completed by the player before the product is displayed
The stages that must be completed by the player before the product is displayed
sdmr.shop.entry.dependencies.factionID.t: Fractions that can buy the product
sdmr.shop.entry.dependencies.mnalevel.ma: If the value is 0 then the maximum value is infinite
sdmr.shop.entry.dependencies.mnatier.max: If the value is 0 then the maximum value is infinite
sdmr.shop.tab.dependencies.mnalevel.maxL: If the value is 0 then the maximum value is infinite
sdmr.shop.tab.dependencies.mnatier.maxLe: If the value is 0 then the maximum value is infinite
sdmr.shop.entry.type.iconPath.tooltip: Right-click to open the extended window
sdmr.shop.entry.type.mnafactionID.toolti: The ID of the faction that is registered in the mod
sdmr.shop.entry.type.mnaneedNonFaction.t: You can only buy when the player does not have a faction
sdmr.shop.entry.type.mnaresetProgression: If enabled, when selling a shooting gallery, the player resets completed tasks of the level that he sold and the level to which he switched
sdmr.shop.entry.creator.type.canbuy: Can be put up for purchase: %s
sdmr.shop.entry.creator.type.cansell: Can be put up for sale: %s
sdmr.shop.entry.creator.type.itemType.de: Allows you to create an item as a product. It is useful if you want to create a store where items will be sold or bought
sdmr.shop.entry.creator.type.commandType: It will allow you to put the team up for sale. To execute from the server side and not from the player, use /execute
sdmr.shop.entry.creator.type.pstType.des: It will allow you to put up for sale or purchase leveling points
sdmr.shop.entry.creator.type.questType.d: It will allow you to create a quest as a product.
I don't know why, but why not :D
sdmr.shop.entry.creator.type.stageType.d: It will allow you to put stages up for sale.
sdmr.shop.entry.creator.type.mnaFactionT: It will allow the use of fractions as a product
sdmr.shop.entry.creator.type.mnaLevelTyp: Will allow you to put up for sale or purchase a mage level
sdmr.shop.entry.creator.type.mnaProgress: It will allow you to submit tasks from oculus for purchase
sdmr.shop.entry.creator.type.mnaTierType: It will allow you to put up for sale or purchase the level of a magician from oculus
sdm.shop.entry.creator.keyinfo: Click the right mouse button and you can add the button to the quick menu
